scripts.say: Hehehe~ too naive! Did you think we'd fall for your little decoy?
Saratoga... just what are you doing...
Hehe, let Miss Sara break it down for you~
If the Sakura Fleet plans to retake this island, there surely must also be an accompanying supply line...
But Shoukaku and Zuikaku were nowhere to be found, and neither were Hiei and Kirishima. That could only mean...
I see... there's a separate force escorting the transport fleet...
Bingo~! As expected of my brightest pupil! Miss Sara is very proud of you!
I contacted our allies to search the surrounding waters while Portland and the others tied Ryuujou down.
And with that, I was able to capture their transport ships! If they were using a decoy in the first place, they were bound to be planning something like this.
Impressive. You managed to think that far ahead even while fighting the enemy?
Hehe~ it's fine to praise me more~â™ª
Having that all said though, Enterprise was the one who drew the enemy's fire and gave us the time to develop this plan...
From this standpoint, you share the same credit for successfully stopping our enemies in their tracks!
Thank you. If that is the case, then these wounds are well-earned.
Don't say that... your injuries are quite severe...
Since the Sakura Fleet has already withdrawn, you should return to port and get some emergency repairs.
Wasp and I will handle the rest, so don't worry!
Sorry for causing you trouble... I'll leave the rest to you then.
Although we managed to win a battle, the war isn't over yet, and the next battle will be even more difficult. We've got to keep our spirits up!
That's right... as long as both sides refuse to budge, this war will continue to rage on...
